periods.name: Tonight
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Mostly Clear
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between 8pm and midnight. Mostly clear, with a low around 72. Heat index values as high as 96. West southwest wind 5 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Monday
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 96, with temperatures falling to around 93 in the afternoon. North northwest wind 5 to 10 mph.

periods.name: Monday Night
periods.shortForecast: Partly Cloudy then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms after 4am. Partly cloudy. Low around 69, with temperatures rising to around 73 overnight. East wind 0 to 10 mph.

periods.name: Tuesday
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 7am, then showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 81, with temperatures falling to around 73 in the afternoon. East northeast wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

periods.name: Tuesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. North northeast wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between three quarters and one inch possible.

periods.name: Wednesday
periods.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Partly Sunny
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 7am. Partly sunny, with a high near 72. North northeast wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

periods.name: Wednesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. Northeast wind 0 to 10 mph.

periods.name: Thursday

periods.name: Friday
